review: We purchased this Fire Stick to go along with our Samsung SmartTV and a subscription to Sling TV after getting rid of cable. It is easy to use and the app menu is great. We also like being able to download movies and shows from Amazon Prime. A wireless extender helps to boost the signal, but this is a TV issue more than the Fire Stick. We did notice a considerably better wireless signal when streaming through the Fire Stick than streaming through the TV's wireless.
